2.45 – 4.30 pm | | Saturday – Sunday | Close | | Public Holiday | Close | ![](https://science.utm.my/pg/wp-content/uploads/sites/120/2024/03/nyr-ads-logo-01-e1710297526397.png) #### Graduate Research Assistant Vacancy For researchers, you may apply to post your vacancies ![](https://science.utm.my/pg/wp-content/uploads/sites/120/2024/03/WhatsApp-Image-2020-03-17-at-9.20.53-AM.jpeg) #### FS Lab Management Support by excelent FS Laboratory Management ![](https://science.utm.my/pg/wp-content/uploads/sites/120/2024/06/summer-school-2024.png) #### SUMMER SCHOOL 2024 To promote scientific research in producing by-products from tropical forest natural resources and investigating its characteristics from forest information. Participants will be exposed to several theories and practices of exploring Malaysian tropical rainforest biodiversity.
